description: A daunted young boy witnesses a death and begins experiencing disturbing visions,leading to him becoming possessed by the same surroundings.Will the boy become a danger to those around him, or will he escape from the horrors.

title: 887. Raa Raa
description: Raj Kiran (Sreekanth) is a film director, who is the son of a very successful filmmaker played by Giri Babu. Raj Kiran decides to follow his father's footsteps but all his films end up as disasters. Finally, his father invests his entire savings in one of his directorial ventures and dies of a heart break when that film flops as well. His mother is hospitalised as well and the doctor says that she will recover only if Raj Kiran makes a successful film. A producer comes forward to make a horror film with him on the condition that he directs it entirely in a desolate bungalow in a forest on the outskirts of the city. What they are not prepared for is the actual presence of ghosts in the bungalow. Will Raj Kiran and his team make it out of the bungalow? Does he realise his dream of making a successful film?

title: 888. Phas Gaye Yaaro
description: based on the fictional horror story about a witch who roams around a jungle resort and abducts every men at night when they are alone outside the resort and only leaves their underwear behind causing many disappearances over the months.

title: 889. Ah!
description: "Ah!" is a gripping thriller set over 12 intense hours. Rahul and Anjali arrive at their new Bangalore apartment, unaware of the eerie events about to unfold.

title: 890. 1:13:7 Ek Tera Saath
description: This story is about paranormal activities happening around us in our daily life which sometimes gets noticed and at times not.

title: 892. Manasariyathe
description: A womanizer frequently troubles a Happy Family. This leads to the husband to threaten the guy publicly. The next day the guy turn up in the family house as a corpse. How the family deals with the corpse and who was responsible for the death is the rest of the movie

title: 893. The Tape
description: They say our destiny is determined by the deed's of our forefathers , Cawnpore Villa is such a story which proves the same - UNTIL ???

title: 895. Benaam
description: A masked man is killing a group of underworld hoods, which has the police and the hoods equally baffled.

title: 896. Meow
description: Four friends who live in an apartment get gruesomely murdered one after the other by an unknown power, which leads to an insecurity among the residents there.

title: 898. Dafan
description: Pooja a young girl keeps getting this restless dreams about an ancestral house, murder of a girl, death of its owner Jagir Singh, etc. But when she tell about it to her fiancé, Vicky, a police officer, the later laughs it away as a wayward joke and a nightmare of Pooja. However life takes a different turn when Pooja recognizes the ancestral house and tries to decipher her dreams as intuitions. The house belonged to Jagir Singh who wanted to open an orphanage on his land, however Prema his consort wanted to grab the land and build a five star hotel in its place. Knowing the reason of Jagir Singh's death becomes a threat for Pooja and she is eliminated, but things don't end there as her spirit is at unrest and then starts the terrible game of life and death as dead bodies pile up. Why Pooja's soul is at unrest? Who was the main culprit in this game of power? Will Vicky get to the culprits before Pooja's soul? Get answer to all of these in Dafan.

title: 899. Bhootachi Shala
description: Saigaon village has no school children have to go far away to the village administrative school as the village school is believed to be haunted and called as Bhootachi Shala.Bunty stays with his grandfather Appa and does not believe in Ghosts as his father as told him that its just human belief.Bunty along with his friends Vicky,Shyamu and two others decide to enter the haunted school as he does not believe in ghost.But just by a flick they manage to escape from the ghost later Vicky is kidnapped by the ghost from his house while villagers decide to perform prays to free the village from the ghost but Bunty and his friend go back to the haunted house to attack the ghost and free Vicky.

title: 901. Half Stories
description: Lakshmi, Chinna, and Shiva are friends who work together in organized crime but when something goes wrong they turn on each other.

title: 902. Kaana Kanmani
description: A girl along with her parents come to a haunted mansion to celebrate holiday.slowly they understood that her daughter is caught by an evil spirit of a child they aborted

title: 903. Jokhini
description: Malaya, a twenty seven years old woman, who is married to the love of her life Maharnav, is pregnant with their first child. She is often left to dwell in her veil of solitude throughout her pregnancy journey.

title: 904. Jenni
description: A 9 years boy gets a traditional wooden toy of a female figure from the site where the digging works are going on. Chandru keeps the toy in his room against the protest of his parents.

title: 905. Cottage No. 1303
description: Justice can be delayed to a human but not to a wandering spirit seeking the vengeance against its perpetrators. Witness how the suspense unfold in Cottage No 1303 where revenge will be taken with no more delay.

title: 907. Kamini
description: Three Boys and Three Girls are in Love. They get Married and leave for Honeymoon. But One Girl gets Possessed with the Ghost of Kamini. Who is Kamini? Why Kamini Possessed that girl? Why Kamini has come back? All will be revealed in the Climax.

title: 909. Love You Raa
description: Sai, Shekhar, Nishanth, and Swathi are inseparable friends who decide to watch a horror film one night. But what begins as fun quickly turns into a serious debate. Shekhar challenges Sai, who insists ghosts don't exist, to witness one in real life. A hefty bet of five lakhs is placed.

title: 910. Lahu Luhan
description: Four friends are on a holiday on hilly region and want female with whom they can have quality time.They come across Sonu a poor village girl and become friends one of the friend Dilip falls in love with her but intentions aren't good and also wants his friends to have their way with her.Dilip comes with his friends to Sonu's house and she is about to revel that Dilip is impotent but he kills her and everyone decides to dispose her body.While trying to dispose her body they find she is very much alive but don't try to save her.Suraj brother of Ranveer one of the culprits comes across Alisha and both fall in love Suraj is unaware that Alisha is indeed spirit Sonu and I's waiting for revenge.

title: 911. Pasivadi Pranam
description: In a twisted world, a husband kills his wife by accident and buries her in the backyard. His life becomes miserable when his house becomes haunted.

title: 912. Vaa Arugil Vaa
description: After being murdered by her in-laws, a young girl's spirit possesses her favorite doll and seeks revenge.

title: 913. Aana
description: Anna, a young woman who lives in peace. One day, she is kidnapped by a few men for their own good, and they torture her until a great power comes to Anna to save her. she must take revenge by punishing those who think they run the world

title: 914. Karma Chakra
description: Five best friends in search of artifacts awakens their fate. Karma blames their ancestors.

title: 915. Irukku Aana Illai
description: The movie begins in a bar, where an aspiring director meets his friends. One of his friend, Meenakshi Sundaram (Aadhavan) says he has a beautiful horror story script from his own experience and narrates what happened in his friend's life.

title: 916. Gandharvya Kanya
description: Abducted, presumed dead, young Pratap survives in an ashram, learns various arts of worship and weaponry, rescues and then falls in love with Kalingnagar's Rajkumari Malti, and wants to wed her. When he visits the region, he finds that many others who had attempted to wed her, had failed due to stringent conditions set forth by her dad, Bhujang Verma, and are languishing in prison. It is then he finds out his parents, who had been duped out of their palace by Bhujang and Rajguru, are alive, blind, imprisoned and tortured regularly, and sets forth to restore their kingdom to them. In order to do this, he must bring back a Mani that is located in a secret cave, guarded by snakes, protect himself from flesh-eating and shape-changing demoness', pygmies, and other challenges, while the wily Rajguru abducts Malti as well as his parents, and intends to hold them hostage until the Mani is turned over to him.

title: 919. Beyond
description: In a remote Himalayan village, a lone woman lives as its last survivor. When she rescues a stranger, he becomes drawn into the mystery of the abandoned place and the secrets she keeps hidden.

title: 921. Nuchwana
description: An Army officer returns home to marry but finds his village terrorized by tales of a three-fingered ghost who kills with scratches. He must uncover if supernatural forces or human deception are behind the panic.

title: 922. Thamisra
description: Four friends set forth to an abandoned mansion in Sakleshpur, where one of the protagonist's dead aunt lived. In the house is an antique piece worth crores. They want to find that and sort their lives out. But, this plan sees a big ghostly obstacle.

title: 923. Bhayaanak Panjaa
description: A group of news reporters faces life threatening challenges from a vengeful spirit while staying at a mansion at the rural area for the reporting of a suspected murder.

title: 924. Trunk
description: With a strong inhuman presence around him, Rahul sets out to fight the supernatural force but will he succeed?

title: 925. Aatakkuntu Lekkakkilla
description: This is a story of two couples, one of which is the newly-married Purushotham (Sanchari Vijay) and Meghana (Mayuri), both of whom are orphans, who lead a happy life, until a certain tragedy strikes and Purushotham's behaviour changes drastically. The other is also newly-wed couple, Sangeetha and Shyam, who happen to be in a haunted house and are then troubled by supernatural elements. As it turns out, Purushotham suffers from a paranoid schizophrenia and suspects that his wife has an extra-marital affair with the spirit of her former boyfriend, which, in turn, leaves their family in tatters.

title: 926. Jojo
description: Mrittika is assigned a bizarre task of babysitting an eerie-looking doll named Jojo. Will she be able to deal with it or will Jojo add yet another dark twist in her life?

title: 929. Yaaro
description: John (Venkat Reddy), who lives alone in a posh villa in ECR. After his paternal uncle siphons off their property after cheating John's parents, his mother passes away and his father goes missing.

title: 930. Shodh
description: Surendra (Om Puri), having been exiled from his village in youth and established himself in the city, comes back to the news of his father's demise, reportedly at the hands of a phantom. He announces a prize for anyone who succeeds in showing him a ghost, which attracts the greed of the poor hungry peasants,resulting in the accusations of innocent people as haunted and even murders with the hope of producing a ghost.

title: 931. 30 Days
description: When the D.C.P. is told that a vacationing college student has disappeared in Ramgarh Picnic Cottage, he deputes Inspector Vijay to investigate and report back to him in 30 days. Upon arrival in Ramgarh, Vijay is confronted with Police Inspector Mukesh Dubey, who refuses to undertake any investigation into this disappearance as he believes that the death was caused by the vengeful spirit of a girl named Shalu. Police Constables would rather be suspended and lose their jobs, rather than take the risk of getting involved with Shalu's spirit. To make matters worse, more disappearances occur, with the mysterious appearance of an investigator of the occult, Robert. As his tenure of 30 days comes to a close, Inspector Vijay will find that he is nowhere near solving this case - and may well end up as a casualty himself.

title: 932. Aik
description: This story is about an individual who conveniently believed that he loved his wife and his three year old son more than himself until he is trapped in something he had designed himself.

title: 933. Pei Irukka Bayamen
description: A newly married couple going into a haunted house for their honeymoon at first they get scared by the ghost couple after knowing what is ghost and their facts, the couple decided to face the ghost couple by themselves in a comedy manner.

title: 934. Amaali
description: As part of the transfer, Dr. Ajay Ghosh and his wife Ramna and daughter Sanaya relocate to a new home. However, a ghost was waiting for them. They experience some unexpected events in their life in the days that follow.

title: 935. Blood Desert
description: An ancient jinn takes over the minds and bodies of foreigners in the deserts of Arabia and drives them to murder each other.

title: 936. One Night At Villa
description: Four architects on a recce trip to Goa find out that the voluptuous lady inviting them to her villa for a night is a witch who feeds on youth. Will they survive the night?

title: 939. Aadamkhor
description: Based on iconic Indian comic book from 80s by Raj Comics, film tells story of Parul Diwan who returns to her father's idyllic cottage for a vacation with her friends.

title: 940. Fantasy
description: The story set in the backdrop of madikeri , The vindictive game of cat and mouse between akhil and Jennifer which ultimately blurs the line between fantasy and the reality in mind of the observer and the observed

title: 942. Sikka
description: "SIKKA" is a story based on today's youth, with a moral ending. This film is about the game called Planchet - the story glues you to the edge of the seat, when a group of friends, one night, while playing this game, toss a coin to call a spirit and start asking questions. They make fun of everyone while the spirit is there. After some time when they command the spirit to leave, to their surprise, it refuses to go! That's when the story begins. Why doesn't she go? What does she want from these boys? Will the boys survive? Many such questions unveil a horrifying and eventful story of "SIKKA". "SIKKA" boasts to be the FIRST EVER PUNJABI HORROR with the combination of horrifying moments that develop further into hilarious & unseen comical sequences, which are amazingly performed by all by our talented actors.

title: 943. Horror Night
description: Horror night is a thrilling Murder mystery horror film based on the Reborn to Revenge of 13 unknown people's.

title: 947. Abba Dabba Jabba
description: Three men with disabilities seek lodging at Aatma Bhavan, attracted by low rent and three beautiful women. They discover the women are ghosts and must fulfill their wishes to escape the haunted house.

title: 949. Vampyr
description: Revolves Around 2 Sisters Who Are Caught The Curse Of A Vampire

title: 951. Dial 100
description: Rahul works as a Manager with a Hotel that was formerly owned by Bajaj, but after his suicide, Prem purchases the hotel and moves in along with his newly-wed wife, Anjali, and sister, Pooja, who is in love with Rahul. They decide to hold a dual celebration for Prem's wedding and the hotel ownership. After the announcement, Pooja gets an anonymous telephone call that Prem's life is in danger. She summons the Police, and Inspector Suraj Malhotra attends with several policemen. Despite of the police presence, Prem is killed after drinking a poisoned alcoholic drink. Suraj decides to hold every guest at the party within the hotel boundaries. He even labels Rahul, Pooja, and Anjali in the long line of suspects which include Nisha, Anand Bajaj, Jatin, Rakesh, and Vicky. Things spiral out of control as one by one the suspects are killed with the Police having no clues whatsoever behind the new killings.

title: 952. Abbai class ammayi mass
description: Sri (Varun Sandesh) faces trouble in keeping his promise to marry Anjali as he falls in love with a prostitute Neeru (Haripriya). Problems begin when a contract killer Das (Kasi Vishwanath) is behind Neeru to kill her. How Sri tackles all these hardships is the rest of the story of Abbai Class Ammai Mass.

title: 953. Rish
description: Rish is a horror story that revolves around a little girl who will be possessed by an evil soul that will try to destroy her family and kill her too.

title: 954. Paradh
description: A wealthy man purchases an old mansion but is perplexed to find a mysterious locked room.

title: 956. Case 19: Vichchhiya
description: One of the rarest explored genres in Indian Cinema, a Found Footage Horror Film. It follows the journey of Inspector Jaydev Sinh Solanki, trying to solve one of the most mysterious cases of our time, Case 19: Vichchhiya, which involves a few people missing in the jungle under mysterious circumstances in the town. Watch The Tale of Greed, Curiosity, and Danger.

title: 959. Ride
description: A loving couple embarks on a trek in the mysterious Andromeda forest for a thrilling pre-wedding adventure. But when the fiancee suddenly disappears, questions arise: Is it a vengeful enemy, a wild animal, or something supernatural? The suspense deepens as the truth unfolds in a gripping thriller.

title: 961. Circus Car
description: A group of four kids enjoy watching horror movies but one of them insists on seeing a real ghost. Later, while wandering in the forest, they come across an abandoned car that is possessed by a spirit.

title: 963. Chumki
description: Chumki takes lift from Sagar on her way to Bhubaneswar from Koraput. During the journey, they fall in love and decide to marry but fate has different plans.

title: 964. Poga
description: A horror thriller loosely based on the life of Telegu actress Pratyusha.

title: 965. Karishma Kali Kaa
description: A devout village woman is framed for theft and murder after being assaulted by four men. Blessed with mystical powers by a holy man, she pursues justice while developing feelings for a police inspector investigating her case.

title: 966. Asuran
description: A scientist doing research in the jungles of India with the the help of natives, faces life or death situation with unknown force that prowls in the jungle.

title: 967. Thanga Pappa
description: Ravi and Gauri move into an abandoned house with his young daughter, Abirami. Problems arise when Abirami gets possessed by a spirit and people are murdered mysteriously.

title: 968. Rahasya
description: A group of college friends who go on a fun picnic trip begins to experience a series of strange and eerie events which leads them to investigate the root of the problem.

title: 970. Brahmapuri
description: A group of adventurers decide to make a deadly trip to Kumari Kandam is a mythical lost continent located south of the present day India where large quantity of treasure is believed to be hidden. Will they survive?

title: 973. Chhodon Naa Yaar
description: Three college friends decide to make the film on the remote village only to hunt them by the spirit.

title: 974. Aagaah: The Warning
description: The body of a young girl is eerily possessed by a recently deceased terrorist.

title: 975. Antha Akkade Jarigindi
description: The story revolves around a game that is conducted by a TV show. The host of the show selects the participants and holds them in a bungalow. However, neither he nor the participants are aware that the bungalow is haunted.

title: 977. Horror Love Story
description: This is fictional a story of two souls who gets together after a terrible disaster and founds vengeance in a comic way.

title: 978. Khatarnaak Manzil
description: A story revolves around Jinpura, a remote village surrounded by jungles and mountains, where an unknown evil power wipes out the entire population, leaving only few survivors, what actually happened there will be unfold mysteriously.

title: 979. Khoonkar Darinde
description: Shakti Kapoor stars in this unintelligible chiller about a bank robber who cheats his co-conspirators out of their share of the loot. One stormy night, a caveman and a lion-monster kill the crook's family, servants, and associates.

title: 981. Chup
description: A married woman who lost her father in childhood lives with her husband. As she lost her father in an accident at very early age she never accepted the fact and she believes that her father do exist. She talks with her Father regularly

title: 982. Kolaru Boys Vlogs : Haunted Hillstation
description: A group of quirky content creators set out to film a vlog in a mysterious village rumored to be haunted, only to find themselves caught in a spine-chilling and hilarious chain of supernatural events.

title: 985. Home Stay
description: A young woman decides to travel to a scenic hill-station in order to surprise her fiance and is forced to spend the night at a secluded home stay. When terrifying paranormal events threaten her life, can she find a way to escape alive?

title: 989. Godless - The Bloody Mines
description: Anything strange 6 young guns, ready to set the world on fire enters Lambi Dehar Mines which is supposedly the most haunted mine in the world for a night camping under paranormal tourism program.

title: 990. Grandma
description: Story is based on a forest banglow. A lady is coming for a teaching job. Then problems they face story flow.

title: 991. Milap
description: It was inspirated by American black and white film-Cult of Cobra which was produced under the banndr Unviveral International Picture and produced by Howard Pine and directed by Francis D. Lyon.

title: 992. Rajnandini
description: A treasure hunter, Retd. Prof. of Archaeology , Fernandez seizes the opportunity to lead two groups of college student in an excursion to "Neel Haveli" a fully haunted century old kings mansion in Kishangunj, where the walls whisper a very sad, sordid and gory history of betrayal, lust, greed, hate and death. The professor searches for a gem studded shrine of "Radha Madhab " believed to be hidden somewhere in the Haveli. History reveals its bloodied fangs of mysticism and paranormal phenomenon - Rahul, reborn into the present era, a student leader, vanishes away with the spirit of his previous births ladylove, the kings daughter, Rajnandini - but not before the professor and nearly all students meet unnatural and ghastly deaths at the hands of the fiery spirits of the haunted mansion. Only Raj and Payel, two students, somehow, luckily escape to lament and tell the world.

title: 993. Ayiram Janmangal
description: Ravi gets married to Savitri and they go to his estate for a vacation. There, Savitri gets possessed by Radha's ghost, Ravi's previous lover.

title: 994. Paathi: the Half
description: Paathi is a movie which talks about raising awareness of abortion. Indrans is in the role of a Theyyam face painter and a local medical practitioner Kammaran, who has a deformed face.

title: 995. Mouchuki Forest Bungalow
description: Mouchuki Forest Bungalow is the first Bengali found footage horror film. It is an edited version of recovered footage from handy-cam of three friends which recorded the paranormal experience of their four days in an unknown forest.

title: 996. Jagan Mohini
description: A seductress falls in love with a prince and tries to steal him from his fiancee.

title: 1000. Raktharakshassu
description: The plot revolves around a renowned writer, his wife who is a fashion designer and their 7-year-old daughter. Upon being insisted by his young and fun-loving wife, he plans a family vacation at an island called Bungalow.

title: 1004. Trapped in Hell
description: Two friends from Bihar , going to attend wedding ceremony. But unknowingly they were trapped into Jungle. Which is surrounded by dead but seems to be alive.

title: 1006. Aake
description: A ghost named Maya becomes the common link between Arjun, an artist in London, and Sharmila, a single mom and struggling actress from Bengaluru.

title: 1008. Ado Deyyam Katha
description: The films revolves Around three main characters, out of which one character is a groovily ghost, with deathly emotions, wanting and waiting to bleed the victim, but the other characters are not aware. The soul is embalmed around the farm house and the tamarind grove. The lead character is curious about this presence and is interested to know her past. As time progresses the soul believes the human and reveals her past seeking his help, but the twist and turns in the movie makes the lead the victim.

title: 1009. Itlu Anjali
description: While the city is under threat from serial kidnaps and killings of Kids, Crime Branch ACP is focused on tracing the criminals. Will the criminal be caught?

title: 1010. Shakthi
description: Two men, a writer and his friend, travel to an abandoned bungalow, unaware that it is haunted. However, when they reach, they meet a ghost who narrates his miserable life story to them.

title: 1011. Modala Male
description: A Villager who comes to the city, encounters a nine-angle love story that is filled with fun, comedy, horror and suspense

title: 1012. Sesha Raati
description: Ravi is an ordinary man who has lost his father and mother. An unsatisfied soul causes great turmoil in Ravi's life. Can he overcome it alone? Will he succeed?

title: 1013. Mr. Homanand
description: Homanand is a sincere man who works hard to fulfill his father's dream of buying a house. With great efforts and hard work, he finally pools enough money and buys a house. After a few days, he comes to know that there is a ghostly creature in the house which is trying to scare him off the property.

title: 1014. The Ghost Resort
description: Chotu (Hero) is a gangster handling settlements in the local vegetable market. Madhu (Heroine) works in a software job. When, her company's HR sta'rts to engage in sexual harassment, she approaches Chotu for help. He solves her problem, and the two fall in love soon after. One day, Madhu decides to surprise Chotu with tickets to "The Ghost Resort". lt's a specially horror themed resort designed to thrill visitors. Even the way they hand out tickets and welcome their guests in horrifying. The whole place is designed similar to a cemetery setup. The staff are all dressed in demonic attires. The customers and the staff have a jolly.time scaring each other. Along with Chotu and Madhu, there are the lovers, Balu and Swapna, the movie technicians, Satish, Vinod and Maggi, the family of Gopal, Supriya and their 3 children, and the old couple Vishwanathan and Sujathamma, making a total of 5 groups as customers to the resort.

title: 1018. Saaya the Mystry
description: A boy who leaves his entire family for his girlfriend and they both get married then he goes with his wife to her house. It is realized that apart from the two of them, there is a third person in the house who is watching over them.

title: 1019. The Bhoot of Rose Ville
description: Rose is in love with Sameer. But her staunch Christian father is against the marriage. An emotional blackmail later, Rose is resigned to marry her childhood orphan friend, Robin (Souradeep). But three days before their marriage, Robin meets with an accident that leaves him severely injured. On the day of their wedding, Robin comes and meets Rose, they exchange rings and even consummate their marriage. But soon after, Sameer brings the news that Robin had passed away the very same day. Three months later, Rose is shocked to discover that she is pregnant. She decides on an abortion and after a few days, Sameer and Rose tie the knot and shift base to Kolkata. 'Three years' later, the couple chooses to sell off Rose Ville. But when Rose comes back, she is haunted by the 'Bhoot of Rose Ville', which in this case is her aborted child.

title: 1020. The Past
description: Three close friends;- Agan,Ravi and Ajay live together happily. But one day laughter turns uneasy when a strange phone call changes everything, pulling them into a chaotic and thrilling night of secrets, fear, and truth they never expected to face.

title: 1021. Iravu
description: A game developer suffers from hallucinations and revolves around a night he spends at a party, hosted at a haunted house

title: 1024. Timir
description: A rich businessman is dead under mysterious and horrific circumstances. Her father is accused of sneaking in an occult expert inside the hospital and performing rituals on her which apparently resulted in her death. Nisha's friend, Ritika, an investigative journalist sets out to find what really happened with her.

title: 1025. Geetha Pilusthondi
description: An abandoned wife dies alone battling cancer-but her spirit lingers. When three young men rent her flat, the haunting begins. As fear spreads, a Swamiji intervenes - but is Geetha's vengeance truly over-or just beginning?

title: 1026. Pithan
description: Kadhir,Jeeva,Gautham,Krishna and Kayal grapple with a demonic summoning In a search to make Online Content

title: 1027. Savitri
description: When love turns into vengeance, even the shadows take sides.
A group of ghost hunters visits an island where they come across some strange powers.

title: 1030. Krurr
description: An exorcist with supernatural powers helps people haunted by evil entities. After a demon kills his family, Sardara Singh continues his vengeful battle against dark forces.

title: 1031. Do Not Disturb
description: In the shadowy heart of Mumbai's Sea View Bunglow harbors a sinister secret: Humaatma, a 70-year-old witch, imprisons souls, including Kirti's, to gain power. After murders and suicides in Sea View Bungglow. Amar Bhargava, Dr. Rahul Bhargava and Dilnaaz confront Humaatma.

title: 1032. Namasthe Ghost
description: Shiva is constantly awakened by the same dream everyday, in order to find the mystery of the dream, he starts playing the spirit game, unfortunately it leads to an other problem, how he overcomes the problem is twist of the story.

title: 1033. Undha..Ledha..?
description: "Sound Kills Without Proof"

title: 1034. Idam Porul Aavi
description: A group of youngsters experienced supernatural being in an old building.

title: 1035. Mantram
description: A newly married couple move into an old house, with a ghost haunting the premises, unbeknownst to them, causing trouble for them and their family.

title: 1036. A203-No Escape
description: A Happy go Man finds himself in a serious situation after he visits a resort

title: 1037. Aami Je Tomaar
description: Mana is about to be married but she is killed before her wedding day. She returns as a ghost to take revenge.

title: 1038. Selfie
description: The story revolves around the death of Poornima Rao, a senior executive in a reputed IT firm, who dies jumping of the high raised IT tech park while taking a selfie.

title: 1039. Rubi
description: A tale about a women who lives in a castle by herself. Nobody ever visits so she sits watching surfing through her binos all day. Whilst its a sad and somewhat bizarre tale, but don't feel sad for her as the surfing is pretty bloody good.

title: 1040. Ghat: The Hill Station
description: Below is a synopsis for Ghat: The Hill Station from the production. Carol Blaire, a young researcher from the U.K.'s Paranormal Centre, has been assigned to make a video documentary of a haunted house at India's 'Ghat: The Hill Station'. The research will give true details of the most visited haunted place in India. Carol comes to India and meets her friend Urmi, a journalist. Carol reveals her assignment to Urmi, and tells Urmi that she needs a crew to assist her. Urmi confides in her boyfriend Ramu, an amateur director, about Carol's project. Ramu agrees to be part of the project, along with his friends Jeetu - a sound recorders - and Ranvir - an actor. Urmi also joins them. Carol divulges the details of her project to the rest of the group. She tells them about Alter Coffin's Villa at 'Ghat: The Hill Station', which is said to be haunted by the spirits of Alter and his fiance, Susan. Legend has it that Alter and Susan were attacked by bandits at the villa. Alter was brutally beaten, and thrown off a cliff. Susan, unable to bear his death, jumped off the same cliff. Since then, it has been said that their spirits haunt the villa and the cliff. Over the years, numerous people have claimed to have seen them wandering around the cliff, while many lovers have even jumped off the same spot. The place has now come to be known as "Lover's Spot". Rambharose, a local guide, leads the group to Alter Coffin's Villa. At the villa, and at Lover's Spot, a number of strange events occur. Carol is the first of the six to see one of the ghosts; however, the others don't believe her. Their disbelief dies before they do....

title: 1041. Baro Baro Geleya
description: Rahul and his girlfriend, Ramya, are on a long drive when they bump into two strangers. The four of them continue the journey together but an unexpected event forces them to stop. They find a guest house but soon sinister things begin to happen. Will they survive the night?

title: 1042. I'll Save Samay Raina and Beerbiceps 13feb2025
1044. Damned Graveyard
description: This story is based on an incident in which a Priest is shown who is the care taker of a cemetery and a builder is to illegally grab the land of that cemetery but Priest stops him from doing so and that builder kills him and builds a beautiful bungalow for his daughter in place of that cemetery After that the bungalow is cursed forever.

title: 1047. Dr Prasad c/o sitara
description: A couple who get married against the wish of their family starts living in a farmhouse where they face weird ghost experiences. What consequences does this lead to and how will they survive is the rest of the story of Dr Prasad C/o Sitara.

title: 1050. Chayamoy
description: Indra Pratap a heir of a kingdom called Raidighi,comes to India for the first time to find the hidden treasure of his ancestors.

title: 1051. Honey Bunny in Ghost Palace
description: Honey, Bunny and their friends find a new adventure when they are stuck in a haunted mansion with no way out. Can they outrun the ghosts?

title: 1052. Moonam Niyamam
description: Moonnam Niyamam is a Malayalam movie directed by Vijeesh Vasudev and featured Riyaz Khan and Varun Kumar as lead characters.

title: 1053. Kaala Mandir
description: Kaala Mandir is a story of an innocent girl who forced to work in the in the sex trade and when she runs away she is raped by her madams goons. A tantrik finds her body and infuses life into her body with his magic powers.

title: 1054. The Piano
description: STORY STARTS ,FROM A FAMILY WHICH IS LIVING IN UK OR EUROPE WITH THEIR 7 FAMILY MEMBERS ,WHICH INCLUDES MAIN LEAD CHARACTER ,HIS WIFE,HIS FATHER, HIS MOTHER. HIS BROTHER, HIS SISTER AND HIS 5 YEARS OLD DAUGHTER. THE MAIN LEAD CHARACTER AND HIS FATHER RUNS A WINE SHOP IN EUROPE AND THEY ARE WELL SETTLED IN THEIR BUSINESS .STORY PROCEEDES WITH THE SEQUENCE OF TALE WHEN MAIN LEAD CHARACTER GOES TO INDIA TO SALE HIS ANCESSTORS PROPERTY AND DURING THAT TIME HE PURCHASED AN ANTIQUE PIANO AND TAKE IT ALONG TO EUROPE AS SURPRISE FOR HIS FAMILY . AFTER THAT ENTRY OF PIANO IN THEIR FAMILY MYSTYRIOUS THING STARTED TO HAPPEN EVERY DAY,WITH ALL FAMILY MEMBERS .WITH THE CONSICUTIVE PROGREESION OF DAYS THAT FAMILY FACES AN EVIL FATE WHICH RESULTS IN DEATH OF THEIR FAMILY MEMBER ON EVERY CONSICUTIVE 7 TH DAY OF EVERY WEEK .WHICH STARTS FROM THE DEATH OF SISTER WHO IS STUDYING IN A COLLEGE AND SHE GOT MURDERED MYSTERIOUSLY BY SOME UNKNOWN SPIRIT.AFTER THAT AN INVESTIGATING OFFICER INCHARGE COMES INTO THE STORY TO INVESTIGATE THE MURDER ,BUT HE DINT FIND ANY CLUE BEHIND THAT.THEN ON LATER ON SECOND WEEK THE MYSTERIOUS DEATH OF YOIUNGER BROTHER HAPPENS IN HIS LABORATORY WHERE HE WAS PERFORMING SOME RESEARCH WITH HIS FRIEND ,EVEN AT THAT POINT INVESTIGATION OFFICER DINT FIND ANYTHING BEHIND HIS MURDER,AFTER THAT THE WHOLE FAMILY COMES INTO TARUMA AND GOT SCHOCKED BECAUSE OF THEIR FAMILY MEMBERS LOSS. AFTER THAT 2 MURDERS THE MAIN LEAD CHARACTER WAS TRAUMATIZED AND HE WAS UNWARE WITH THE NO REASON BEHIND THEIR DEATHS.THEN AFTER 3 WEEK A CONSICUTIVE DEATH OF MOTHER HAPPENS ALONG WITH WIFE AND HERE IS THE POINT WHERE STORY COMES OUT IN AN AGGRESSIVE REVENGE FROM A SPIRIT.

title: 1055. Shadow
description: Five friends plan to venture out to the forest where people are afraid to go. Though the people in the locality and the family members object to go to this haunted place, they courageously get into the forest.

title: 1056. Jainsi
description: Jainsi Is an Indian Horror and Suspens Film Produced By Aryan Hasan and Sayarabano Ansari Under Banner Of P&L Entertainment In Association With SMD Motion Picture. If we talk about the cast in this film, Aryan Hassan is playing a character named Rohan who is Riya's husband.

title: 1060. Raaz Darr Ka
description: "Raaz Darr Ka" is the story of a girl who runs away from home at the age of 16. His father is addicted to alcohol, which causes him to assault his mother, and is killed in an alcohol-addicted accident. After her death, her mother leaves her orphanage and after another marriage, her stepfather does not treat her properly. When she grows up, her stepfather tries to abuse her, but the girl kills her stepfather to save her life, and runs away from home. Then the ghost of his stepfather bothers him. He meets a boy who loves him and removes him from this whole problem. When the boy tries to find out about the girl and investigates, he comes to know that there is no real ghost in the girl's mind. When the boy sees the picture of that person, then he comes to know that the person who is in power with the girl, is really alive. And the girl comes out of this confusion. Then both get married and after some time the girl gets cancer. After that, the boy does research again and tells the girl the power of positive thinking and once again saves the girl from a disease like cancer. After twenty years of marriage, the boy is delivered. But now, through positive thinking, the girl makes her life's purpose to change the life of the rest of the people and not to think and give direction to the life of the people.

title: 1061. Muhnochwa
description: The infamous case of Muhnochwa that took place in 2002 in Kanpur is back now, Muhnochwa is back to haunt more people and this time its not just rumors or scars but a lot more than that. From the minds of Award Winning director Sankshay Babber.

title: 1062. Samyuktha 2
description: Every year, on a particular date, a medical student goes missing from the institution named Samyuktha. As the mystery and dread surrounding this strange phenomenon grow by the day, a student sets out to investigate the disappearances. All the clues lead to an abandoned bungalow, but mortal danger awaits in the shadows for those who come there seeking answers.

title: 1063. Ek Thriller Night
description: A group of friends go to an isolated house in the middle of the night. Certain incidents that happen in the house make them feel like they aren't the only ones in the house. Scared and confused, the bunch of youth try to escape from the house. Watch the movie to find out what happens next.

title: 1064. Maniac
description: Two couples goes missing.

title: 1067. Jiss Raat Ki Subah Nahin
description: One Night Many Nightmares. Wake up and Run.

title: 1074. Roohani
description: Story is thriller based on old customs of India. A girl named Roohani is killed by a Tantrik along with her family. She takes revenge with help of his alive brother. Film is full of comedy and thrill. Written by Deepak Saraswat, Rohit Pyaare. Other casts are Sanjay Jangir, Rohit Pyaare, Urmila Sharma. Title song is sung by Shahid Mallya.

title: 1078. Bhootchakra Pvt. Ltd.
description: The story revolves around three youngsters and their search for ghosts. They get a unique machine called Bhootjantra, declared them as ghost hunters who can eradicate evil spirits. They start the enterprise named Bhootchakra Private Limited and decide to make some profit on it. But unexpectedly their lies turn out to be true, the friends trio fall into a serious trouble.

title: 1079. The Lost Tape
description: Five youngsters went into the woods of Chail, Himachal Pradesh to explore an old urban legend's story. They were completely unaware of the fact that they were slowly becoming part of the story. The more they found out, the closer they got to the unexplained reality, of what they thought was merely a myth. After entering into the woods, they were never seen again. The search went on for 6 months and the case was closed. Until one day, police recovered a digital video recorder, which held the unexplained secret. This film unfolds the mystery of those 5 youngsters' mysterious disappearance. A tale of Love, friendship, betrayal and fear. Fear of the devil and fear of the Lord himself.

title: 1080. Manthrikan
description: An exorcist falls for an amnesiac woman named Malu. Years later, during a house call for an exorcism, he encounters her again, but she has no memory of their past together.

title: 1083. Teri Talash Mein
description: Shortly after the double homicide of his dad's business partner, Mehta, and Shilpa Mehta, Akash Sandhu returns home to Ratnapur, and runs into the ghostly apparition of Shilpa. After recovering from the shock, he goes on a business trip to Mahabuleshwar, meets and falls in love with Shilpa's look-alike Shalini. He meets with her dad, who agrees to get them married. Before he returns home, he decides to introduce Shalini to his friend, Rajesh Mehta, but are unable to locate her. They approach the local Police for assistance, and it is then Akash will be devastated and utterly baffled when he is told that Shalini has been dead for more than 20 years.

title: 1084. A Flat
description: A spate of unexpected events jolt Rahul as soon as he lands from U.S. He finds himself trapped in his own flat, completely cut off from the world. The only companion he has is a ghost that will not let go of him.

title: 1085. Pretham Undu Sookshikkuka
description: A haunted mansion amid Kingini Nagar Housing Colony is converted into a police station. Ghosts get provoked by the intrusion of the police. To overcome the horrible night duties, cops take the help of Babu, an outlaw yet sincere guy.

title: 1086. Bhuvana Vijayam
description: Eight strangers with different backgrounds and problems compete in a high-stakes challenge for a chance to win life-changing rewards, but they soon discover that one of them will pay the ultimate price.

title: 1087. Devi - Ek Pretmanobir Panchali
description: A dark witch's quest for ultimate power is threatened by a prophecy about a gifted young woman. As the foretold date approaches, an epic supernatural conflict looms between ancient magic and destiny.

title: 1089. O
description: Two sister fall into love with same guy. Will black magic play role to get desires of Sisters?

title: 1090. Megasandesam
description: A young singer fall in love with a ghost that is visible only to his eyes. The movie shows the aftereffects of this love.

title: 1091. Unmatta
description: Aditi is a student of literature, suffering from Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder after being raped as a child and suffers from frequent sleep paralysis. Siddhartha is an inquisitive science student, who is experimenting on Telepathy using mind-altering drugs. He persuades his 3 friends Nuha, Chaitanya and Vijay to support him in his bizarre initiative. After initial success in his experiment with Nuha, all 4 of them decide to experiment together at a farmhouse. Aditi joins them as a sitter (like a designated driver). However, the collegians' exciting weekend adventure soon turns into a string of nightmarish events, when they are confronted with deep questions regarding their own desires and true nature of consciousness.

title: 1092. Ice Cream
description: The protagonist is obsessed with eating ice cream and suffers from a nightmare disorder.

title: 1093. Dreadful Chapters
description: Six friends gather in a remote homestay to celebrate their vacation. They were surprised to discover a cave there. In the cave, they were unaware of the mysteries that awaited them.

title: 1094. Bawla
description: A young military cadet hunts down her sister's killer as corpses pile around her in rapid and relentless succession.

title: 1095. Orr Eravuu
description: A Paranormal Investigator's one night experience of his 19th and last case in a haunted house at Munnar.

title: 1096. Kathe Chitrakathe Nirdeshana Puttanna
description: Puttanna is an aspiring filmmaker, who comes to Bengaluru from Raichur. After several unsuccessful attempts, he finally finds an interested producer. He narrates a story about horror tales that a filmmaker faces revealing in the end that it's no fictional tale but his own encounters. How do they tackle the ghost?

title: 1097. Bhadra
description: Subhadra and her fiance, Jayadevan are killed by a sinister politician, Sebastian Joseph. The vengeful ghost of Subhadra kills Sebastian in retaliation and vows to destroy his entire family.

title: 1098. Hun Tan Bhog Hi Painge
description: Kamz Singh and Roop (Sara Gurpal) along with their friends visit Jogi's Home, where BN Sharma is the care taker of the property in a Village and paranormal activities starts happening and comedy riot follow.

title: 1099. Shaitani Dracula
description: Dracula now lives in a remote Indian villa, accompanied by his army of monsters, consisting of vampire girls, a werewolf, a skeleton man and several other demons. When a group of campers arrive Dracula sets his eyes on the attractive girls of the group and lets his monsters pray on them. Chanta, one of the girls, figures out that heir opponent is a vampire and sets out to defeat him with the power of the cross.

title: 1100. Sirivennela
description: A paranormal investigator finds herself face-to-face with the angry poltergeist of a young child with a dark and tragic past.

title: 1102. Amavas Ki Raat
description: Amawas Ki Raat revolves around Tantrik who best tows his knowledge to his wife Nanda hoping that she wiliest it for the good of humanity. Now Tantric Nanad receive a letter from her sister Nanda who reveals that she is in the seventh month of pregnancy and has been discarded by society in panic Nanda goes to meet her sister Sunanda but it is tool late. Sunanda breaths her last in Nandas hands overwhelmed by emotions and anger nanda swears over the dead body of her sister to take revenge on society. Through her Tantric Vidya she gives birth to her dead sisters child on seeing this her husband the Master Tantric warns her that what she is doing is against the principles of tantra vidya as the child born would be ademon... born on the 13th day of the month on Amawas ki Raat. The great tantrics prediction come true. The demon child grows up to be a dreaded killer on every Amawas ki Raat he roams the streets in the darkness of the night and brutally murders innocent people with reason D.I.G. Vindo Saxena is assigned with the task of catching the killer on one Amawas ki Raat he comes face of face with the killer and succeeds in shooting him down. Nanda with her tantric vidyas revives the demon from his grave as a result of which he becomes more frightening and he turns his anger to ward D.I.G. Vinod Saxenas family and near and dear ones one by one the D.I.G.s family members are killed. The Master Tantric, shocked and baffled Approaches D.I.G. Vindo Saxena and reveals the secret of killing the Demon to him.

title: 1103. Bhoy
description: Amitabha "Amitabha" and Rupsha "Monami" Chakraborty's hunt for a suitable house leads them to a bungalow which seems ideal for their needs. Even after learning that the previous tenant "Tanusri" had committed suicide, the couple start living there. Trouble starts immediately. The maid and the guard invade Rupsha's space with sinister, knowing smiles during the day, and at night she is kept awake by the sound of mournful lullabies emerging from behind closed doors. Windows crack, utensils crash, dolls start to speak and things come to a head when the guard is violently murdered.

title: 1107. Nagesh Thiraiyarangam
description: A real estate broker tries to sell a theater which is haunted by a ghost.

title: 1108. Boo Main Dargi
description: In this movie, there is a boy who loves a girl but the girl's father says that you should have this much money and then he finds a treasure in an old mansion and the girl's father agrees.

title: 1109. Kadampari
description: Arul and his sister Ruthra and friends Jency ,stella,victor travelling to hills station near by andhra area from Chennai. On the way, they met an accident and all got injured .they are all try to find some help in middle of the Forrest , also it's raining. Leaving the car, they finally found one house in the forrest. There is a old man living in that house , his name is beemsing . They ask help and explain the situation to that old man . But beemsing told them to seek help in town in dumb language. Their injuries convince him to let them in, but he warns them to not leave the hall. Arul and beemsing go outside to get firewood. As ruthra and victor wander around the house to find a bathroom, ruthra hears a girl crying out for help in through water pipe . They hide when they hear beemsing return and see him check a basement door before the others mollify him. When ruthra and victor check the basement, they find Anamika (beemsing daughter),but they thought she is innocent and beemsing kidnapped and locked in a box. Beemsing angrily confronts them with a rifle, but Arul saves them by knocking out beemsing . Arul lets Anamika out of the box and ties up Beemsing . Anamika does not speak much, and, when beemsing regains consciousness, he only tells them that they will all die in dumb language . They gag him and look for a working car or phone, to no avail. They soon become suspicious when they discover the house has so many suspence and Beemsing has a decades-old photograph of Anamika then only they came to know she is his daughter , and the box is carved with occult symbols. Anamika taunts Beemsing by telling him that she will kill everyone. When he frees himself, he slashes his wrists and runs at her with a knife. Victor , who earlier took Beemsing rifle, shoots and kills him. As stella and Anamika separate from the others to talk, suddenly one police man arrives and demands to see Beemsing . When they explain that they had to kill him in self-defense, police man orders them at gunpoint to enter the box. Arul briefly enters the box, but rushes police man and disarms him. Police man reveals that Anamika is a witch. She can take over the body of anyone who kills her current host. Beemsing locked her up nearly 40 years ago after his daughter was possessed. The witch knows everyone's secrets and uses them to sow discord and encourage people to kill her, so she can inhabit the strongest person. She need 1000 healthy bodies to travel and get back her original body .Stella kills Anamika after she threatens to reveal Stella's abortion, and victor kills the witch (stella ) when she reveals that he is a serial killer who preys on young women. Police man encourages them to wound the witch (victor ) rather than kill her, but Ruthra accidentally kills victor. The witch (ruthra) taunts them by revealing that Arul turned off Police man's life support without telling jency. After they bring Ruthra back to the house, Arul insists they find a way to cure her, but Police man says it is not possible. The witch frees herself from Ruthra, kills police man, and promises to let Jency live if Arul will sacrifice himself, as the witch does not want to inhabit Ruthra's injured body. Arul initially refuses, but, after the witch appears to him and disfigures herself, he agrees. Before Arul can sacrifice himself, Jency kills the witch herself. Overcome with grief, Arul locks Jency (now possessed) in the box.

title: 1111. Yuga
description: The story is about a scientist who stays at Kollimalai Hills to find ways and means to tackle the rocks that are to fall from moon and destroy the earth. The problems that he encounters in his mission form the crux. It is a convoluted story that makes you to leave reasoning and logic in cold storage. Narendran (Nassar) as usual, is good at his role. Charumadhi (Swarnamalya) gets an opportunity to show her acting talent. Unfortunately, Rishi (Richard Rishi), who had a good outing in Naalai, recently just plays a second fiddle. Charuhasan has nothing much to do. The movie begins with Professor Narendran, who finds out that rocks from lunar craters would fall on earth and destroy the world soon. Narendran and his assistant Charumadhi choose to keep it as a secret and decide not to create panic in the earth. They are joined by a group of students which include Rishi and Boys Manikandan in accomplishing their mission. They come across a different problem. Charumadhi's father (Charuhasan), led by a group of men, forms a cult. They decide to die and plan to take revenge on the humans for polluting the world. Narendran and his team come to know of their plans. The rest is how they tackle both the problems.

title: 1113. Andheron Ka Sayya 2
description: Andheron Ka Sayya 2 follows Kaalesha and Dhanraj as terror returns after the Iron Nail is disturbed again. Through voodoo games and deadly trials, a hidden truth about the Katjuri Colony curse slowly comes to light.

title: 1114. Haunted Resort 2016
description: THE STORY OF HAUNTED RESORT REVOLVES AROUND FOUR FRIENDS 2 BOYS AND 2 GIRLS, WHO PLAN TO VISIT A RESORT FOR PLEASURE AND ADVENTURE, BUT THE RESORT IS A HAUNTED PLACE INHABITED BY GHOSTS AND THESE GHOSTS ARE CONTROLLED BY JK, THE VILLAIN WHO HAS SOME MAGICAL POWERS AND HE USES HIS EVIL POWERS ON THOSE COMING TO THIS RESORT. THIS RESORT HAS A PAST ALSO WHICH UNFOLDS AS THE STORY PROGRESSES. THE PLOT AND THE NARRATIVE HAVE ENOUGH TWISTS AND TURNS TO KEEP VIEWERS ENGROSSED IN THE PLOT. THE MOVIE WAS SHOT IN BEAUTIFUL LOCALES OF GOA WITH GOOD CINEMATIC WORK.

title: 1115. Shaitani Badla
description: College students rape and murder a servant who comes back from the grave to take revenge.

title: 1116. Episode 13
description: TV crew uncovers terrifying mystery in a reclusive family's home in rural Maharashtra, where strange events threaten their survival as they uncover a mind-bending truth.

title: 1117. Ieandavi
description: Three couples take on an adventurous journey into the forest but soon one of the girls goes missing. Their search for her takes a horrific turn when one of the boys dies. Soon, the group realizes that the culprit is not a person but a vengeful ghost. Will the rest of them survive?

title: 1120. Kankal
description: Kankal is a social horror drama which shows how a spirit can fulfil its desire with its intense power. The story begins with Abhay being killed by a skeleton and police come for the inspection. Dr. Sanyal takes us back to the story where Tarala got married to Rattan, a rich man. But Tarala's sister-in-law's brother, Abhay was in love with Tarala whom Tarala didn't like for his bad attitude and lower education. So to take the revenge, Abhay married Rattan's sister. By moulding Rattan, Abhay took all his wealth and tried to rape Tarala. Though Rattan came to save her, he was being driven out by Abhay. In this situation Tarala passes away unknowingly and Abhay tried to hide her dead body by throwing it in the river. Rattan unable to find his wife became mad and roamed around in search for her. At last he came under the observation of Dr. Sanyal and they finally found Tarala's skeleton. When by co-incidence, Abhay came for his x-ray to Dr. Sanyal, Tarala took his life in the form of skeleton and thus punished him for his wickedness.

title: 1121. Bachcha Aur Shaitan Horror Movie
description: Pooja and Rahul join their ten year old son Bunny in a boarding school Bunny is kicked out of the school for his weird behaviour A deeply upset Pooja takes him to a psychiatrist for treatment the doctor suggests a unique therapy

title: 1122. Raqt
description: After death of her sister and her brother in law Sonia adopts their daughter Suhani.Sonia gives all live to Suhani so she doesn't miss her parents.But his has a wrong effect on Suhani as she gets obsessed by Sonia and will not allow anyone come between them.

title: 1124. The Maya Tape
description: On the trail of Maya Chudail (witch) locked up in a desolate mental hospital on an island in North East India, TV reporter Devika and Cameraman Saurabh are caught up in the deadly web of Black Magic, Occult, Possessions and Terror.

title: 1125. Aaravalli
description: Aaravalli is a women-oriented story. Aaravalli is the name of Queen who rules on Men. The story is set in the kingdom of Nellurupattinam of which the title character Aaravalli (G. Varalakshmi) and her sister Sooravalli (S. Mohana) are disputed rulers. The story in fact refers to seven sisters, but the reins of control were in the hands of these two women Aravalli and Sooravalli, who are described as magician. Bheema offers to conquer them. But Bheema (Thirupathisamy) faces defeat at the hands of these two women, who utterly humiliate him and send to prison. But he escape from prison. Then, Sooravalli visits Indraprasta and she complains to King Dharma (K. Nadarajan) for his brother Bheema and Dharma send back his brother for nelluru pattinam. The astrologer skill Sahadevan to formulated a master plan against the two cunning women. The plan is their nephew Alli muthu (S. G. Eswar) the son of their Sister Sangavathy (M. S. Draupadi), for the specific purpose of taking challenged posed sisters on behalf Pandavas. So, Alli Muthu and his companion named as Arayathi (Kaka Radhakrishnan) arrival to Nelluru Pattinam Kingdom. After long travel, their spent few hours for rest and Vainsh hungry and thirsty. Alli Muthu was got some rarity herbal nearby the water pond and their kept at it. Finally, their come to Nelluru pattinam and meets the magician's Queens and her posed three challenge to him. And alli Muthu accepts three challenges. alli Muthu meets Aaravalli's daughter alangaravalli (Mynavathi) at palace his impressed with her. Alangavalli and Alli Muthu fall in love. Then Alli Muthu faced three challenges and victory end of this challenge to help of dominate queen daughter Alangaravalli. As a sign of their submission the two queens offers their daughter alangaravalli in married to victory. The newly wedded couple and Arayathi arrives to Indraprasta Kingdom. The pair make their way into forest where the bride in her innocence follows the instruction of her mother and g

title: 1126. Atmaharaam Live
description: A struggling social media influencer goes to a cremation ground and learns a way to use ghosts to become famous. However, not all spirits mean well.

title: 1127. Kanakamahalakshmi
description: When an archaeologist unearths mystical anklets near a hidden temple, she becomes entangled in a supernatural chase. A man emerges from a coma to seek her out as deadly forces converge.

title: 1128. S5
description: A chief minister books a complete compartment of a train for his son as a surprise birthday gift. But the compartment S5 turns into a graveyard for everyone who is inside.

title: 1129. Jessie
description: Jessie is a triangular love story that explores the effect of religion on love.

title: 1130. Ghost of the Golden Groves
description: Strange incidents occur in the heart of shonajhuri forest in rural bengal (the backdrop for both stories) which develops an ominous character of its own that allures and finally engulfs our protagonists.

title: 1132. Khallas: The Beginning of End
description: Jyoti Shinde lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Pune along with her parents. . While in college, she was friendly with a fellow-collegian, Sachin Mhatre. Afer college they parted but meet again after five years, and fall in love. Sachin tells her that he is a computer engineer, and she invites him and three of his friends, Bantu, Akki, and Bholu, to her 20th birthday party. During the party, she introduces Sachin to her parents, who approve of him, and both continue to meet. Jyoti does not realize that one day soon her life as well as the lives of her parents will be turned upside down when Assistant Commission of Police, Akhlaq Khan visits them and tells them Sachin and all of his friends are not who they claim to be but are actually gangsters belonging to Badshah Khan's gang, and all are wanted not only by the police, but also by a rival gangster, Raghu Patil.

title: 1133. X6
description: What is a ghost? Does it have a shape or size? or a gender? or is it an evil force? there are no perfect answers for such queries. There are stories saying that few people have seen a ghost. But there are no apparent evidences..

title: 1135. The Dead Are Alive
description: The dead are coming back to Life. From One man's revelation to a nationwide alert makes the armed forces get ready for a full scale war with this newfound enemy. But how do you kill whats already Dead?

title: 1136. Paranormal Evil
description: Karthik makes a documentary on Alzheimer's disease. His subject, Malathi Menon, lives in a small town outside Harippad with her daughter Athira. Karthik and his team arrives at Malathi's place and start noticing her inexplicable behavior.

title: 1137. 127 B
description: 127B Film Synopsis: Hyderabad and its old city, One Story that explores 3 people lives in the extremities of human behavior involving social and economical distress. A fight between myths, integrity and characters. As the three friends find short way which can make them rich overnight. How this twisting ride does turns to a horrific experience and lands them into chaos. Three people's adventure and what it leads to is a fun to watch story. One story, two extremes, seven gates and Blind myth.

title: 1138. Subhadram
description: Manu forms a deep connection with a sculpture in his college. However, he later realizes that the sculpture bears a striking resemblance to a mysterious girl named Subhadra.

title: 1139. Ms. Lekha Tharoor Kaanunnathu
description: Ms. Lekha Tharoor is so intelligent and smart who is the anchor of a game show. Her encounters with some of the guests and some events that follow change their life in a totally unexpected way.

title: 1140. 6 Athiyayam
description: 6 Athiyayam is an anthology with 6 parallel stories that are correlated and the climax of each story is revealed only in the finale.

title: 1142. Swaha: Life Beyond Superstition
description: A Holy man has an unsettling experience after visiting the house of one of his devotees.

title: 1146. Atma Vasikaranam
description: A boy who murders a father and also kills his guru and committed rape and murdered a girl.

title: 1148. Khopdi: The Skull
description: A girl is raped by four men who dies after the incident but her spirit takes revenge.

title: 1150. Bhramh Road: The Beginning
description: The film tells the chilling story of four inseparable friends who decide to break the monotony of their lives with an adventurous late-night drive. Searching for fun and thrill, they wander far from the main highway, stumbling upon a mysterious, unnamed path that the locals whisper about as 'Bhramh Road.' Initially, the group laughs off the eerie atmosphere, treating the journey as just another part of their adventure. But as the road stretches on endlessly through a dense, unnatural fog, the atmosphere shifts from excitement to pure dread. Suddenly, the laws of physics and logic seem to bend. Their vehicle stalls without reason, and the silence of the night is shattered by inexplicable paranormal activities. Whispers in the wind, shadows that move on their own, and a feeling of being watched by something ancient and malevolent begin to tear at their sanity. The road becomes a psychological labyrinth where every exit leads them back to the same terrifying spot. As the night grows longer and the paranormal encounters become more physical and violent, the friends are forced to face a horrifying question: Is this road a physical place, or a trap designed to consume their souls? Caught between reality and a waking nightmare, the group's bond is tested like never before. With no signal, no help, and an entity that feeds on their fear, their 'fun trip' turns into a desperate battle for survival. Will they be able to solve the mystery of the 'Bhramh' and find their way back to civilization, or will they become just another legend lost on the road that doesn't exist? Desperate and isolated by Sonia's unique visibility, the friends realize their only hope lies in confronting her again. Their fathers, bound by a long history, witness their children's terrifying decline and, sensing something beyond the ordinary, decide to journey to Rajgarh Manor, each carrying their own unspoken anxieties. As the friends desperately seek Sonia, their fathers unearth unsettling secrets tied to Rajgarh Manor and their own shared past, hinting at why Sonia might be targeting their children. The suspense builds as the two generations converge on the manor, each facing their own terrifying truths. Will they be able to break Sonia's hold, or will her revenge consume them all? And what devastating secret will the friends uncover about their fathers, forcing them to question everything they thought they knew? Their attempts to cure her with the assistance of a Tantrik is of no avail, and she refuses to co-operate with Dr. Rao, a Psychiatrist, leaving the question open whether she has a mental illness or the killer is an entity from another unknown dimension.

title: 1616. The Incantations: Origin
description: Investigator Amaira D'Costa rescue a girl from an abandoned mansion and things starts messing up with her.

title: 1622. Khooni Aankh
description: Khooni Aankh - Synopsis Five Couple embark on a seemingly innocent picnic trip deep within a dense forest. As night falls, they find themselves lost and stranded, the darkness punctuated only by the flickering light of their campfire. To pass the time, they begin sharing chilling horror stories, each tale more terrifying than the last. The final story is told by a mysterious individual who reveals a shocking secret: he is Kaali Singh, a spirit trapped in the forest for 300 years. He claims to have died centuries ago and has been roaming the woods ever since. As the full moon reaches its zenith, a palpable sense of dread settles over the group. The following morning, the peaceful forest is transformed into a scene of horror. The picnickers are found dead, victims of Kaali Singh's supernatural wrath. The news of the massacre spreads like wildfire, capturing the attention of a determined reporter and a group of friends connected to the deceased. Driven by a thirst for truth and a desire to understand the legend of Kaali Singh, they venture into the same foreboding forest, retracing the steps of the ill-fated picnic. As they delve deeper into the woods, they uncover clues and whispers that paint a terrifying picture of Kaali Singh's vengeful spirit. The film culminates with a chilling scene of a new group of unsuspecting visitors entering the forest, suggesting the cycle of horror is destined to repeat itself, leaving the audience with a lingering sense of unease and the chilling realization that some legends are best left undisturbed.

title: 1627. Akshaa drushyaa
description: Akshaa drushyaa, a horror thriller revolves around lovers who ran away from their village to get married, accidentally they trapped in a strange magical forest. After that they came to know, maze and death incident follow them.

title: 1630. Rambh
description: The story runs around a Care Taker, stuck in a bungalow with two little souls driving the Care Taker with all the paranormal activities happening in the house.

title: 1632. Saddu

title: 1638. My Friend Bazuzu
description: A lonely young man moves to a new city, burdened by isolation and the weight of his thoughts. He wanders through empty streets, searching for something to fill the silence in his life. One evening, while trying to buy a diary to confide in, he stumbles into a small, unsettling shop. The shopkeeper convinces him to take home a strange white doll with closed eyes Bazuzu. At first, the doll becomes his only companion. He talks to it, keeps it close, and slowly begins to feel less alone. But soon, the line between reality and imagination starts to blur.

title: 1639. Shadow: The Haunting of Grace
description: A little girl claims she is being followed, apparently by more than just her shadow.

title: 1643. Melghat Chronicles
description: A couple enter a remote jungle, to uncover the truth behind a mysterious suicide. Their journey is revealed in the form of mind-bending footage, recorded on their camera.

title: 1644. Sostenuto

title: 1647. Mane No.67
description: A youngster driven by career ambitions often lets her personal life take a backseat comes across Dev and Akash who leave a lasting impact on her and her perception towards the world.

title: 1648. Anant Shrankhla
description: Protagonist wakes up from a post-traumatic memory loss and finds himself as an experimental test subject and hostage of a mysterious tourism organization named Bharatiya Abhasik Paryatan Yojna .

title: 1656. Amal
description: Explore the journey of a man battling erectile dysfunction. Seeking mystical aid, he delves into Sifli magic but faces unforeseen consequences.

title: 1659. 1947 August 14th
description: 1947 August 14th ,a film produced by Midhun Thomas and Mohd. Noufal under the banner of Zain Motion Pictures.The film is written and directed by Rahul Dev, The background of the story is set in the historical background of British-controlled India as the name suggests. The film features Midhun Thomas & Shreya in key roles; while the British Characters are donned by Mac Fernandes, Sherry, and Joanne. Aadesh, Aneesh, Shruti, Ghazal, and Preety play the other characters. The Cinematographer RM Swamy has done a marvelous job with innovative lighting and subject-specific visualization. The editing is done by Bibin Paul Samuel and the Art Director of the movie is Shiju Augustine. The music is made by Mahadev.s(Dev Major). The movie talks about the rebellion of soldiers who were ill-treated during British rule and how a British family was killed during this outburst. This horror movie is multilingual and is shot through many generations.

title: 1662. Dukhad patr

title: 1663. Witchcraft - No Mercy in The Dark
1664. Bungalow No 10 the Last Stage of Horror
description: Two Robbers enters a haunted Bungalow where they are killed by two ghosts living in that property for many years.

title: 1669. Case of Bisarpani
description: Three youngsters went for camping at 'Bisarpani' area near Mainpat , Chhattisgarh , and they never returned from that trip. A week later their cellphones , bag packs & a camcorder was found by a local cattleman in the forest. This video is a rough edit of the footage from the found camcorder.

title: 1673. Jinnaatma
description: A mysterious figure is killing one by one some college teachers, and their students are trying to solve this mystery. When the mystery unfolds, it looks like an impossible story to end.

title: 1674. Aatma Aur Parmatma
description: Aatma Aur Parmatma is a 2004 Indian horror film directed by Ramana. The film stars Anil. Ananthnag and Kirti Chawla in the lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Indra. Watch the full movie Aatma Aur Parmatma online, only on Eros Now.

title: 1677. Behrupiyo
description: Behrupiyo is a folklore horror rooted in the soil of Gujarat haunted by an ancient curse. Many years ago, something strange happened inside a royal household that changed the fate of an entire village. A ritual was performed. A choice was made. After that night, unexplained incidents surrounded the land and people learned not to question what they could not understand. In the present day, three friends arrive at a heritage property connected to that past, dismissing the legend as superstition. But the curse still breathes. A young girl hears whispers. A warning repeats: "Don't drink the water." It darkens. It carries something unseen. A strange mark appears. A curse does not die with time. It awakens when disturbed.

title: 1678. Oru velliyayicha rathri
description: Oru Velliyaazhcha Raathri is a groundbreaking Malayalam AI-animated horror-investigation thriller. The story follows a mysterious investigation that unfolds in a rural setting, involving a tea shop owner and a house owner, blending supernatural elements with a suspenseful detective narrative."

title: 1680. The Final Hour
description: A group of individuals find themselves trapped in a high-stakes situation where every decision carries life-changing consequences. As tension rises and hidden motives begin to surface, time becomes their greatest enemy.
